name: Rock Island: Kick n Pop
description:
Controls:

use WASD to move, SPACE to jump, and CLICK LEFT MOUSE BUTTON near spikey objects to activate a projectile predictor to see where you'll kick.

Description:

Control Gerasimos Livitsanos, the bassist for the experimental rock band Palm, as he kicks spikey objects to pop balloons on Rock Island.

Credits:

Art/Programming/Music: Sean Park
